definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to help/to assist/mutual assistance/to rush into or up/to raise or hold up/high/tall/old variant of 欀/chariot horse (old)/change (old)

sentences.english: We must be home by six.
sentences.chinese: 我們必需在六點曩昔回家。

sentences.english: So I went over and translated for them.
sentences.chinese: 於是我走曩昔爲他們翻譯。

sentences.english: EX:That reminded me of the time when I hingzheimerwis disease to lose weight by just eating pears.
sentences.chinese: 那讓我想起曩昔那段只吃青蘋果減肥的日子。

sentences.english: I used to live in tainan but now I live in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 本人曩昔住在臺南，但如今住在臺北。

sentences.english: We used to go to the movies about once week.
sentences.chinese: 本人們曩昔經常一週去看一次片子。

sentences.english: The reporter was the hot pursuit of lovers to think of oneself of bullying jie an empty purse yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 記者對苗渺的窮追不捨使凌桀想起了本人的曩昔。

sentences.english: But now I get up half an hour earlier than ever.
sentences.chinese: 但自己如今比曩昔夙起啦半個鐘頭。

sentences.english: Happiness is hearing your parents' strories memories.
sentences.chinese: 幸運便是，聽怙恃講那曩昔的事。

sentences.english: In the past 10 years, great changes have taken place in our school.
sentences.chinese: 在曩昔的10年裏，我們黌舍發生了複雜的改變。

sentences.english: The "loneliness of the distance learner" is a thing of the past.
sentences.chinese: “長途教育是零丁的”概念仍舊成爲曩昔。

sentences.english: Tell me about yourself and your past experience.
sentences.chinese: 說說你自己以及曩昔的一些經驗吧。

sentences.english: When the girl saw the terrible appearance of the snake, she fainted and fell to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 當女孩看到啦蛇恐怖地表面，她面青脣白，昏啦曩昔。

sentences.english: It reminded me of the mistakes I had made before.
sentences.chinese: 這使我想起了我曩昔犯過的一些錯誤。

definition: sack/tube open at both ends/(onom.) footsteps
